ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Sometimes a passing thought will seem so real that it frightens me.
Notes: 0=Certainly does not aplly to me; 1=Possibly does not apply to me; 2=Unsure; 3=Possibly Applies to me; 4=Certainly applies to me

ElementDescription: Sometimes my thoughts seem as real as actual events in my life
Notes: 0=Certainly does not aplly to me; 1=Possibly does not apply to me; 2=Unsure; 3=Possibly Applies to me; 4=Certainly applies to me

ElementDescription: No matter how hard I try to concentrate on my work unrelated thoughts always creep into my mind
Notes: 0=Certainly does not aplly to me; 1=Possibly does not apply to me; 2=Unsure; 3=Possibly Applies to me; 4=Certainly applies to me

ElementDescription: In the past I have had the experience of hearing a person's voice and then found that there was no one there
Notes: 0=Certainly does not aplly to me; 1=Possibly does not apply to me; 2=Unsure; 3=Possibly Applies to me; 4=Certainly applies to me

ElementDescription: The sounds I hear in my daydreams are generally clear and distinct
Notes: 0=Certainly does not aplly to me; 1=Possibly does not apply to me; 2=Unsure; 3=Possibly Applies to me; 4=Certainly applies to me

ElementDescription: The people in my daydreams seem so true to life that I sometimes think that they are
Notes: 0=Certainly does not aplly to me; 1=Possibly does not apply to me; 2=Unsure; 3=Possibly Applies to me; 4=Certainly applies to me

ElementDescription: In my daydreams I can hear the sound of a tune almost as clearly as if I were actually listening to it
Notes: 0=Certainly does not aplly to me; 1=Possibly does not apply to me; 2=Unsure; 3=Possibly Applies to me; 4=Certainly applies to me

ElementDescription: I often hear a voice speaking my thoughts aloud
Notes: 0=Certainly does not aplly to me; 1=Possibly does not apply to me; 2=Unsure; 3=Possibly Applies to me; 4=Certainly applies to me

ElementDescription: I have been troubled by hearing voices in my head
Notes: 0=Certainly does not aplly to me; 1=Possibly does not apply to me; 2=Unsure; 3=Possibly Applies to me; 4=Certainly applies to me

ElementDescription: On occasions I have seen a person's face in front of me when no one was in fact there
Notes: 0=Certainly does not aplly to me; 1=Possibly does not apply to me; 2=Unsure; 3=Possibly Applies to me; 4=Certainly applies to me

ElementDescription: Sometimes, immediately prior to falling asleep or upon awakening, I have had the experience of having seen, felt or heard something or someone that wasn't there, or I had the feeling of being touched even though no one was there.
Notes: 0=Certainly does not aplly to me; 1=Possibly does not apply to me; 2=Unsure; 3=Possibly Applies to me; 4=Certainly applies to me

ElementDescription: Sometimes, immediately prior to falling asleep or upon awakening, I have felt that I was floating or falling, or that I was leaving my body temporarily
Notes: 0=Certainly does not aplly to me; 1=Possibly does not apply to me; 2=Unsure; 3=Possibly Applies to me; 4=Certainly applies to me

ElementDescription: On certain occasions I have felt the presence of someone close who had passed away
Notes: 0=Certainly does not aplly to me; 1=Possibly does not apply to me; 2=Unsure; 3=Possibly Applies to me; 4=Certainly applies to me

ElementDescription: In the past, I have smelt a particular odor even though there was nothing there
Notes: 0=Certainly does not aplly to me; 1=Possibly does not apply to me; 2=Unsure; 3=Possibly Applies to me; 4=Certainly applies to me

ElementDescription: I have had the feeling of touching something or being touched and then found that nothing or no one was there
Notes: 0=Certainly does not aplly to me; 1=Possibly does not apply to me; 2=Unsure; 3=Possibly Applies to me; 4=Certainly applies to me

ElementDescription: Sometimes, I have seen objects or animals even though there was nothing there
Notes: 0=Certainly does not aplly to me; 1=Possibly does not apply to me; 2=Unsure; 3=Possibly Applies to me; 4=Certainly applies to me
